
                            
                            <div class="xdg"><p>宝可梦12点更新红包，今天没领到的去领宝可梦5分钟快速领取12元教程<br><br>1.通过游戏链接进去，链接放下面，苹果直接下载好游戏后可以不用重新下，安卓必须重新下载<br>2.游戏快速升级，引导教程那里选不需要，直接到7级<br>3.回到链接点击去领6元<br>4.抖音搜索宝可梦直播间，点手柄去绑定微信好领取6元<br>5.切下一个号<br><br><a href="https://game.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/activity/static/game_distribution/index.html?liteapp=liteapp%3A%2F%2Fwxalite16643a0473b2d98c32c8777cd5fa72e6%3Fpath%3Dpages%252Fgame_distribution%252Findex&amp;wechat_pkgid=activity__circle_daily_lottery_index&amp;appid=wxa151425a4b6e7db5&amp;aid=616895&amp;bid=game_share&amp;pid=0&amp;kid=X-IwbOiOay0bdA37jRyIUIwOBs39_SyWZOHIAATAYBs-v2&amp;share_key=gDf75yYL38j7uEh4v2tTGpLpO_JkxAuHFzzYJsrNlGM&amp;pm_share_key=gDf75yYL38j7uEh4v2tTGpLpO_JkxAuHFzzYJsrNlGM&amp;promoter_target_id=30001&amp;ssid=1&amp;from_id=3&amp;share_id=QX0Goz6-SauNCq7yw-ulQQ&amp;origin_share_id=uZ-YwgjTS9iqHMmoEtLuAA">https://game.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/activity/static/game_distribution/index.html?liteapp=liteapp%3A%2F%2Fwxalite16643a0473b2d98c32c8777cd5fa72e6%3Fpath%3Dpages%252Fgame_distribution%252Findex&amp;wechat_pkgid=activity__circle_daily_lottery_index&amp;appid=wxa151425a4b6e7db5&amp;aid=616895&amp;bid=game_share&amp;pid=0&amp;kid=X-IwbOiOay0bdA37jRyIUIwOBs39_SyWZOHIAATAYBs-v2&amp;share_key=gDf75yYL38j7uEh4v2tTGpLpO_JkxAuHFzzYJsrNlGM&amp;pm_share_key=gDf75yYL38j7uEh4v2tTGpLpO_JkxAuHFzzYJsrNlGM&amp;promoter_target_id=30001&amp;ssid=1&amp;from_id=3&amp;share_id=QX0Goz6-SauNCq7yw-ulQQ&amp;origin_share_id=uZ-YwgjTS9iqHMmoEtLuAA</a></p></div>
